title: Mating Net
description: Prince Devoron-Vitan, supreme commander of the Tigron Empire's star forces, wants to go home and find out what the star-blazes is going on.In one short gestate, his twin brother Djohn-Kronos has killed their father, taken the throne, nullified all existing royal betrothals, and started a war.Prequel taking place 70 years before the events detailed in FORCED MATE.
author: Rowena Beaumont Cherry
